form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES, A21 2203 763

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 A 21 203 763 AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES I, THiEu BANH being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I have on deposit in banks in the United States and in other countries the following: Location Name of Bank Amount o 2. I have stocks and bonds in the United States and in other countries in the amount of $ market value as follows: Company Government Unit No. of Shares or Bonds Value Q 3. I own real estate in the United States and in other countries as follows: Location Value Mortgages and other encumbrances thereon amounting to 0 1. I have in currency, gold, silver, diamonds, commodities, objects d'art in the United States and in other countries as follows: Location Item Value 5. I have the following assets in real and personal property in the United States and in other countries, not listed above as follows: Location Item Value a 6. My total net worth is as follows: $ (Complete and true Signature 10 Applicant) Subscribe fore me by the above-named applicant at CP PENDLETON, CA on JUL 1975 (month/day/year) Name of Interpreter (Print) Signature of Interpreter Ronald moon BPA. (Signature and Title of Officer) (Reverse of this form may be used if additional space is needed) Form G-648 (6-2-75) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTIC E Immigration and Naturalization Service
